description: This module consists of one 5-week, full-time clerkships, and is designed to further develop the studentsâ€™ knowledge and skills in a variety of practice settings. Students will be able to select from a variety of patient care and non-patient care clerkship sites.
title: Elective Clerkship III
prerequisite: Acceptance in the Pharm.D. program and require min CAP of 3.5 after Year 1 didactic component, or by permission.
